title: A Fairground Ride

children.value: A fairground ride consists of a rough cylinder that rotates about a vertical axis through its centre. Once people are inside and the cylinder is rotating fast enough the floor is removed but the thrillseekers do not fall down.

answer.value:
The minimum angular speed needed for the ride to be safe is 
$\valuedef{\omega }{\sqrt {\frac{g}{\mu R}}}{}$
.

children.value: What is the minimum angular speed at which it needs to rotate for the ride to be safe?
